pullRequest.title: [BEAM-10896] Support ZetaSQL UNNEST syntax on array of struct type
pullRequest.bodyText:
CalciteSQL and ZetaSQL have different ways of handling UNNEST an array of struct type. In order to not break CalciteSQL dialect, enable different rules and rels for ZetaSQL dialect:

ZetaSqlUnnest to replace Calcite Uncollect
BeamZetaSqlUncollectRel to replace Calcite BeamUncollectRel (uncorrelated case)
BeamZetaSqlUncollectRule to replace Calcite BeamUncollectRule (uncorrelated case)
BeamZetaSqlUnnestRel to replace Calcite BeamUnnestRel (correlated case)
BeamZetaSqlUnnestRule to replace Calcite BeamUnnestRule (correlated case)

This is a temporary solution before we upgrade vendored Calcite to >= 1.23.0. After upgrade we may use the "set struct alias" feature to simplify the solution. See details in the JIRA.
r: @apilloud

nodes.bodyText: Could you put this in it's own package 'org.apache.beam.sdk.extensions.sql.zetasql.unnest' or something like that? That will make it easier to keep this isolated for eventual deletion.
